extension.name: Export Entry
extension.description: Export a section's entries into a `.csv`. This extension is deprecated by the [Import/Export CSV](http://symphony-cms.com/download/extensions/view/53429/).

releases.release: - Added support to filter on and export entries using the Select Box Link field - Tidied up the Javascript to be a bit nicer & faster - Added some basic localisation support - Better Error Handling when `DatabaseManipulator` is not present
- Completely overhauled the output to use each fields prepareTableValue function
- Now returns 'first item' from linked BiLink Fields in CSV - Fixed UI Bug when switching from between sections - Checks that field has data before output
